mapper.select: select distinct evcom.eval_committee_no as evalCommitteeno, evcom.name as name, subann.sub_title as subtitle, evcom.eval_started_at as evalstartedat, evcom.eval_closed_at as evalclosedat, evta.eval_status as evalstatus from sub_announcement subann inner join eval_committee evcom on subann.sub_ann_no = evcom.sub_ann_no inner join evaluation_member evmem on evmem.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no inner join eval_task evta on evta.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no

select distinct rp.task_name, rp.rnd_institution, mem.name, evta.eval_completed_at, evta.eval_status from sub_announcement subann inner join eval_committee evcom on subann.sub_ann_no = evcom.sub_ann_no inner join evaluation_member evmem on evmem.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no inner join eval_task evta on evta.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no inner join rnd_plan rp on rp.rnd_plan_no = evta.rnd_plan_no inner join member mem on mem.mem_no = rp.mem_no where evcom.name = #{name}
